TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {26919=April 2013, 27424=June 2013, 47976=For the list of the Prize winners, available after 2/28/14, send an SASE by 2/28/14 to: Goldfish Team Xtreme Pick Your Play Sweepstakes Winners, PO Box 997, Plainview, NY 11803 - 0997., 28676=November 2013, 35141=September 2013, 27668=July 2013, 25974=December 2012, 48190=© 2012 Tenthwave Digital, LLC. All Rights Reserved., 27164=May 2013, 28932=December 2013, 26206=January 2013, 28168=September 2013, 28443=October 2013, 26688=March 2013, 16075=You may enter online or at our website through a wireless mobile device. To enter the Sweepstakes, go to www.goldfishfun.com at any time during the Promotion Period. Click on the Team Xtreme Pick Your Play Sweepstakes button, and you will be taken to the Team Xtreme Pick Your Play Sweepstakes home page. If you are a current Team Xtreme member, you will be asked to sign in with your user name and password. You will then receive one (1) entry in the Sweepstakes when you provide your parent’s email address and click "submit" during the Promotion Period. If you are not a current Team Xtreme member, you must sign up to become a Team Xtreme member by completing the Team Xtreme registration page including your user name, birth date, state, and password. Once you have become a Team Xtreme member, you can receive one (1) entry in the Sweepstakes when you provide your parent’s email address and click "submit" during the Promotion Period. Entry(ies) must be received by 11:59:59 PM ET on 12/13/13 in order to be eligible for the Grand Prize random drawing. Entry(ies) must be received from 12:00 AM ET on the first day of a month through 11:59:59 PM ET on the last day of a month in order to be eligible for that Monthly Drawing. Entry(ies) received in each month will not be eligible for subsequent Monthly Drawings. Limit one (1) Sweepstakes entry per person/user name via this method during the Promotion Period. Limit one (1) user name per person. You will only receive one entry when you register for the Sweepstakes. Additional Entries: You can earn one additional entry in the Sweepstakes each day by recording your play time in the Play Tracker on the GoldfishFun.com website. An entry is earned when a minimum of 30 minutes of play time is recorded. There is a maximum of one additional entry each day, regardless of the amount of play time recorded in the Play Tracker. For the purposes of this Sweepstakes, a "day" is defined as the 24-hour period beginning at 12:00 AM ET and ending at 11:59:59 PM ET. An entrant can earn a maximum of 359 extra entries via this method during the Promotion Period. Additional entries must be received by 11:59:59 PM ET on 12/13/13 in order to be eligible for the Grand Prize random drawing. Additional entries must be received from 12:00 AM ET on the first day of a month through 11:59:59 PM ET on the last day of a month in order to be eligible for that Monthly Drawing. Additional entries received for each month will not be eligible for subsequent Monthly Drawings., 21692=One (1) potential Grand Prize winner will be selected on or about 12/30/13 in a random drawing from among all eligible entries received throughout the Promotion Period. Five (5) First Prize winners will be selected in each Monthly Drawing which will be conducted on or about the 15th of the month following entry from among all eligible entries received for that respective month; and one hundred fifty (150) Second Prize winners will be selected in each Monthly Drawing (except December 2012 and December 2013 when (99) Second Prizes will be selected) between the months of January 2013 and November 2013 which will be conducted on or about the 15th of the month following entry from among all eligible entries received for that respective month. In the event there are not enough eligible entries received for a Monthly Drawing to award all First and Second Prizes, those remaining First and Second Prizes will not be awarded. All drawings will be conducted by Tenthwave Digital LLC, 35 Pinelawn Rd, Suite 207W, Melville, NY 11747 ("Promoter"), an independent judging organization. Parents of potential prize winners will be notified by email, and asked to provide their mailing address for prize fulfillment and their child’s apparel size, if needed. Decisions of the judges will be final and binding on all matters relating to this Sweepstakes., 26434=February 2013, 30848=February 2013, 32671=May 2013, 15045=The Pepperidge Farm Goldfish Team Xtreme Pick Your Play Sweepstakes ("Sweepstakes") begins at 12:00 PM Eastern Time (ET) on 12/19/12 & ends at 11:59:59 PM ET on 12/13/13 ("Promotion Period"). Promoter’s computer is the official time-keeping device for the Sweepstakes. One (1) Grand Prize will be awarded at the end of the Promotion Period in a random drawing ("Grand Prize random drawing") from among all eligible entries received during the Promotion Period. Five (5) First Prize(s) will be awarded at the end of each month in a random drawing ("Monthly Drawing") from among all eligible entries received for each month during the Promotion Period. One hundred fifty (150) Second Prizes will be awarded at the end of each month (except December 2012 and December 2013, when (99) Second Prizes will be awarded) ("Monthly Drawing") from among all eligible entries received for each month during the Promotion Period.}
textBeforeTable: Sixty five (65) First Prizes awarded as follows: Water Sliding - Wisconsin In-Line Skating - California Ice Skating - Colorado Mountain Biking - North Carolina Snowboarding - Utah Snorkeling - Florida Skiing - Montana Kayaking - Michigan Skateboarding - Kentucky Hiking - Wyoming Golf - Pennsylvania Body Boarding - California Eligible Grand Prize Location/Activity options: One (1) Grand Prize: A 4 night/5 day trip for (4) to a location within the U.S. to participate in one of the 12 activities featured throughout the promotion. Prize includes air transportation, hotel accommodations, hotel/airport transportation, $1,000 spending money and activities corresponding to the destination chosen. Actual value of trip prize depends upon the city of departure, time of travel, any airfare fluctuations and on current market conditions at time of prize fulfillment, and any difference between the stated ARV and the actual value if any, will not be awarded. See "Travel Restrictions" section below for further information. Average Retail Value (ARV) of Grand Prize: $7,000. 6. Prizes/Odds of Winning: Open to legal residents of the 50 United States and the District of Columbia, ages 6 - 13 years of age only at time of entry.
